content: FOUR! Pitched-up on middle and off, Joe Root presents a full face of his bat and drives this past mid on to his left for a boundary to wrap things up. England wins this by 3 wickets and seals the series 2-0.
On a length around middle and off, Joe Root tucks this to mid-wicket for a couple. Scores are level.
LEG BYE! On a length around middle and off, Adil Rashid misses out on the flick and deflects this off his thigh pad towards cover for a single.
Short-pitched on middle and leg, Adil Rashid gets hit on the chest gurard with the ball deflecting to backward point for no run.
Good length on middle and leg, Joe Root flicks this to deep mid-wicket for one.
Length on off, Adil Rashid defends this out.

On a length around middle and off, Adil Rashid goes for the front foot defensive stroke but misses. The ball nips back in sharply and Rashid gets hit on the pads. Matthew Forde appeals for LBW but the umpire shakes his head. Hope sends this upstairs, hoping for something positive but the UltraEdge shows a spike as the ball was next to the bat and WI loses a review.
FOUR! Fine and wide of the fine leg fielder running to his right for four. Pitched short around leg, Adil Rashid hits this fine and finds the fence for four.
300 comes up for England with this single. Good length on middle and off, Joe Root hits this through square leg for one.
A dramatic dot. On a length wide of off, Joe Root initially wanted to go for the scoop as he stepped across. The ball got close to him and he ended up guides this to short third for no run.
On a length around middle and leg, Adil Rashid flicks this to wide mid on for one.
FOUR! SUBLIME! Short-pitched, around leg. Joe Root waits for the ball to come closer to him before pulling this flat and through the vacant space at deep backward square for four.
On a length around off, Joe Root pushes this to extra cover for a dot again.
Length on off, Root stays towards the leg side and pushes this to extra cover.
Good length on off, Adil Rashid dabs this to third man region for a single.

FOUR! Not the worst number 9 in the world. One of the finest instead. Short-pitched, on middle and leg, Adil Rashid pulls this up and over mid-wicket for a boundary. This will settle the nerves of the English spectators.
On a length wide of off, Joe Root cuts this to the third man region for one.

OUCH! That must have hurt Adil Rashid but he takes one for the team. Short-pitched, into the rib cage of Adil Rashid. Instead of going for the pull and giving something to the fielders out in the deep he decided not to throw his bat at it and gets struck on the rib cage. Brave from Adil Rashid.
Too full, on the pads, Adil Rashid gets trapped deep inside his crease. Luckily for Adil and England, the ball was spraying down the leg.
Short-pitched, around middle and off. Adil Rashid gets solidly behind the line and defends this out.

OUT! IN THE AIR AND GONE! Brydon gets undone by the short-pitch ploy from Alzarri Joseph. Short-pitched, into the body, Brydon Carse moves to his leg and goes for the pull to match fire with fire. The ball gets spliced up in the air towards Jayden Seales at fine leg and he makes no mistake.
Brydon Carse c J Seales b A Joseph 2 (7b 0x4 0x6)

FOUR BYES! It has gone straight through the keeper's gloves for four extras. Short-pitched, around off, Brydon Carse swings and misses. The ball has sailed just over the keeper's grasp for a boundary behind the stumps.
Back of a length around middle and leg, Carse chips this just short of short mid-wicket.
On a length around off, Brydon Carse tucks this to deep mid-wicket for one.
Good length on middle and leg, Joe Root hits this to deep mid-wicket for one.
FOUR! Maiden score of over 150 in ODIs for Root. It keeps getting better and better for Root. Short and wide outside off, Joe Root backs away to his leg and lofts this over cover for four.
Good length on off, Brydon Carse drops this in front of cover and takes a quick single.
Short-pitched, around middle and leg. Brydon Carse doesn't look comfortable at negating this nd gets hit into the shoulder with the ball deflecting back to the keeper on couple of bounce.
Short and wide outside off, Joe Root cuts this to deep point for one.
Carse is greeted with a fierce bumper. Does well to duck down.

OUT! TRAPPED IN FRONT! Slower one, on a good length angling into the better. Will Jacks gets late into the flick and gets beaten on the inside. The ball goes past the inside edge and hits WK on his back pad. A confident appeal and the umpire raises his finger. Joe Root advises Will Jacks to send this upstairs and he does that. The Ball Tracker shows the umpire's call on the ball clipping the top of leg. Will Jacks departs one short of his half-century.
Will Jacks lbw A Joseph 49 (58b 2x4 0x6)
Good length on off, Will Jacks blocks this out on off.
Short-pitched on middle and off, Joe Root pulls this through mid-wicket for one more.
On a length around middle and off, Joe Root gets an inside edge onto the pads with the ball rolling to short third for one.
Bends his back and darts a short-pitched delivery on off, Joe Root ducks down.
Goes for the yorker, in the line of stumps. Joe Root thumps this through mid-wicket for one.

NO BALL! Good length on middle and leg, Will Jacks tucks this through mid-wicket and takes one to keep the scoreboard ticking. The third umpire spots that Jayden Seales has overstepped and he is asked to bowl another delivery. Free hit up next.
Good length on middle and leg, Joe Root tucks this through square leg for one.
WIDE! Bumper, way over the height of the batter. Joe Root leaves it. Wided.
Back of a length on off, Joe Root blocks this out on off.
Back of a length on middle and leg, Will Jacks tucks this through mid-wicket and takes one.
Good length on off, Joe Root guides this to third man region for one.
On a length around the pads, Joe Root flicks this to wide long on for two.
FOUR BYES! Bumper, around the leg, Will Jacks sits underneath and the ball has raced to the fence for four.
Short and wide outside off, Will Jacks cuts this to right of deep third for one.
Another single as Root has pulled this one.
Short-pitched, into the body, Will Jacks fends this to mid-wicket for one.
On a length around middle and off, Joe Root tucks this away towards deep on leg for one.
Good length on middle and leg, Will Jacks flicks this through mid-wicket for one.
Good length on off, Will Jacks thumps this towards sweeper cover for one.
On a length around middle and leg, Joe Root flicks this to deep mid-wicket for a single. Joe Root also breaches the 1000-run mark against West Indies alone in ODI cricket.
SIX! JOE ROOT GOES BIG AGAIN! On a length around middle and off. Joe Root shimmies down and away and just hammers this as straight as an arrow over the bowler's head for a biggie.
Good length on off, WJ pushes this away for one.

Short and wide on off, Will Jacks dabs this toward backward points left for no run. WJ was keen on the single but Root denied the single on offer as Roston Chase did superb to dive to his left and field this.
Back of a length on middle and off, Will Jacks tucks this through square leg and scampers back for two.
FOUR! Way too full on the pads, Joe Root gets down on a knee and sweeps this through backward square leg for four. Root is making this chase look like walk in the park.
Pushed through on the pads, Joe Root gets hurried and misses out on the flick.
Quicker one around off, Will Jacks rocks back and pulls this flat towards deep mid-wicket for one.
Full and on the pads, Joe Root sweeps this to deep square for one.
FOUR! LOVELY FROM ROOT! Tossed up on off, Joe Root shimmies down to the pitch of the ball and hits this gun barrel straight towards the fence in front of the sight screen for four.
Tossed up on the pads, Will Jacks flicks this through square leg for one.
On a length around middle and off, Will Jacks pushes this to sweeper cover for one.
Short-pitched, on middle and off, Joe Root leans back and upper cuts this to third man region for one. Brings up the 100-run partnership between Root and Will Jacks.
Shouts of catch it and Hope does catch it but nothing given by the umpire as Joe Root appears to have missed out on the attempted square cut.
FOUR! Easy pickings for Joe Root. Short-pitched on middle and leg, Joe Root gets behind it and pulls this up and over mid-wicket for a boundary.
Short and wide outside off, Will Jacks cuts this to deep point for a single.
On a length wide of off, Joe Root plays this late and guides this to third man region for one. The amount of runs Root scores in this area is insane.
Quicker and flatter on the pads, Joe Root paddles this to deep backward square for one.
FOUR! Third boundary of the over already. Tossed up on off, Joe Root shimmies down the track, gets on top of the bounce and lofts this over extra cover for four.
Full and on off, Joe Root flicks this to short mid-wicket for no run.
FOUR! Reverse scoop for four this time. Tossed up on off, Joe Root this time plays this fine and scoops this to the left of short third this time for four more.
FOUR! Cruise control from Root. Tossed up on off, Joe Root reads the length early and nails the reverse sweep for a boundary to the short third's right.
Tossed up on middle and leg, WJ flicks this to deep mid-wicket for one.
Short-pitched on off, Will Jacks pulls this away for one.
Excellent running between the wickets. Good length on the pads, Will Jacks tucks this towards the right of Keacy Carty at deep square and scampers back for two.
Good length wide outside off, Will Jacks slashes hard at it but misses.
Good length on off, Joe Root tucks this to wide mid on and runs one.
Full and on off, Will Jacks guides this to third man region for one.
Short-pitched, on middle and leg, Joe Root pulls this through square leg for one.
Too full on middle and off, WJ finds short mid-wicket for no run.
Tossed up on the pads, Joe Root nudges this through mid-wicket for one.
WIDE! Tossed up, wide down the leg. Root misses the paddle sweep. Wided.
Full and on off, Will Jacks drives this to sweeper cover for one.
Fired on the pads, Joe cuts this through point for one.
FOUR! CENTURY FOR ROOT! Full toss on the pads, Joe Root sweeps this wide to short fine leg's right for four runs to bring up his century.

SIX! DISPATCHED TOWARDS THE SHORT SIDE! Short of a length on middle and leg, Joe Root gets deep inside the crease and pulls this over deep mid-wicket fence for a biggie. This did not come out of the middle of Root's bat but he hit that with the breeze and that was enough to take it over the fence.
Slower one around off, Will Jacks pushes this to point for no run.
Back of a length on middle and off, Joe Root nudges this away from the fielder at mid-wicket for one this time.
On a length around middle and leg, Joe Root tucks this to mid-wicket for no run.
Good length, around off, gets a leading edge through cover for one.
Back of a length on middle and off, Joe Root pulls this flat to deep square for one.
Good length on middle and off, Root flicks this to mid on for no run.
A single to end the over.
Fired, full and down the leg for no run. Joe Root stepped across and went for the paddle but missed.
There is absolutely no need for it from Joe Root of all. Full and around off, Joe Root steps across and goes for the ramp. Gets it off the thigh pad and deflects this to short fine for no run.
Tossed up on middle and off, Will Jacks glances this to deep mid-wicket for one.
Fuller on the pads, Joe Root flicks this to deep square for one.
Short of a length on off, Will Jacks smashes this to deep cover for one.
Full and on off, Will Jacks drives this to sweeper cover for one.
Good length on off, Joe Root goes deep inside his crease and guides this to third man region for a single.
FOUR! Root hits 7000 runs in ODIs with this single for England. Short and wide outside off, Joe Root cuts this past point and the ball has raced to the fence for four runs.
Good length on off, Joe Root smashes this but still to the fielder.
Slower one, wide outside off, Joe Root swings early and misses.
Good length on middle and off, WJ plays the cover drive for one.
Quicker and fuller on off, Joe Root pushes this closer to cover for no run.
FOUR! Swept away for four. Tossed up on off, Joe Root takes a big step across the line and sweeps this through backward square leg region for four runs.
Tossed up on middle and leg, WJ rolls this to long on for one.
Too full on off, Will Jacks blocks this towards point.
Full and on off, Will Jacks defends this out on the off side.
FOUR! That's been smashed away for four. Short of a length on middle and off, Will Jacks rocks back and pulls this flat and hard through mid-wicket for four runs.
Hits the hard length on off, Joe Root blocks this to mid off for no run.
Slower one on middle and leg, WJ flicks this through square leg for a single.
Good length on off, Will Jacks dabs this to backward point for no run.
Good length on the pads, Will Jacks tucks this to short mid-wicket for another dot.
Good length on off, Will Jacks punches this to short cover.
Short-pitched, around off, Joe Root hops up on his toes, drops his guard and just guides this to third man region one more time for a single.
A dot to end the over as Will Jacks pushes this closer to Motie's left.
Flicked off the back foot for yet another single.
WJ gets lucky. Will was playing for the turn but it angled in on him. Jacks gets it away off the inside of his bat towards square leg for one.
Another single as Root has driven his to sweeper cover.
Slower through the air on off, Will Jacks gets it past short extra cover for one.
Short and wide of off, Joe Root hits this to sweeper cover for one.
Played late and toward third man region for another single.
Back of a length on middle and leg, Will Jacks tucks this to deep square for one.
Slower one, around off, Joe Root drives this to sweeper cover for one.
On a length around off, Will Jacks pushes this through cover for one.
Back of a length around off, Joe Root gets it chopped nearly onto the stumps. The ball flies past the leg pole towards fine leg for one.
FOUR! GLORIOUS! Pitched-up on middle and leg, Joe Root steps inside and nails the on-drive for a boundary. The timing on this left no chance for Keacy Carty at mid on to dive and field this.
Timed this well but straight to cover for no run.
Too full on middle and off, WJ gets on top of the bounce and jams it out.
Quicker and fuller around off, Will Jacks pushes this extra cover for no run.
Tossed up on middle and leg, Will Jacks steps out in front and defends it out.
Floated on the pads, Will Jacks nudges this to long leg for two.
FOUR! Smashed away to the fence. Short of a length around off, Will Jacks hops back and smashes this through cover for four.
Back of a length on the pads, Jacks has flicks this to fine leg for one.
Back of a length around off, Joe Root steps in and tucks this towards deep on leg for one.
Short-pitched, on middle and off, Joe Root plays for the pull but misses.
Back of a length around middle and leg, Joe Root flicks this to short mid-wicket.
Short-pitched, into the batter, Will Jacks nudges this to deep backward square for one.
Good length on middle and off, Joe Root flicks this to deep square for one.
Too full and in middle and off. Root pushes it to long off for a single.
Flat and outside off. Root punches it to cover.
Another single as Jacks bunts it to deep square leg for one more.
Flat and on middle and leg. Root tucks it to square leg where the fielder slips while fielding but does well to keep it down to one.
Very full and on the pads. Jacks turns it to deep square leg for a single.
Flat and in angler on middle. Root flicks it to mid-wicket for a single.
Pushes it full and around off. Jacks watchfully defends it out.
Fuller delivery on middle and leg. Jacks nudges it to deep mid-wicket for a couple of runs.
Outside off. Root dabs it to third man for a single. A scrambled seam delivery but Root plays it well.
A good length delivery on middle. Root defends with a straight bat.
Touch fuller and outside off. Jacks punches it to cover for a single.
Joseph starts with a length ball on middle and off. Jacks solidly blocks it on the off side.
Jacks is off the mark as he drills it to long on for a single.
Tossed up on off. Jacks leans and blocks it out.

OUT! LBW! That really looks dead. Bethell still take it upstairs. UltraEdge shows no bat. Ball Tracking shows THREE REDS. Not sure why he took the review. Very full and on middle and off. Bethell looks to defend close to his pads but misses and gets hit on the pads. An appeal and up goes the finger. Dead plumb. A big breakthrough for the Windies.
Jacob Bethell lbw R Chase 17 (28b 1x4 0x6)
Outside off and it turns back in. Root cuts it to cover for a single.
Bowls it tight into the stumps. Root blocks it out.
Fractionally short and outside off. Root goes back and slaps it past cover for a couple of runs.
Too full and outside off. Root dabs it to third man for a single.
This is full and outside off. Bethell punches it late to point for one more.
Touch fuller and on middle. Bethell flicks with great timing but to mid-wicket.
Bowls it full and on middle and off. Bethell defends under his eyes.
Too full and on middle. Root flicks it past mid-wicket for a single.
Slightly short and outside off. Bethell hits it past point for a single.
This is short and outside off. Bethell cuts it past point for a single.
Flatter delivery and on off. Bethell punches it to cover.
On middle, fuller. Root takes the charge and lofts it over cover for a single.
Very full and outside off. Bethell plays it past cover for a single.
Floated full and on middle. Root works it to long on for a single.
Full and on middle. Root reverse sweeps it to point.
Back of a length on off, Joe Root guides this to third man region for one.
Pushed in the gap for a single by Bethell.
Pitched-up on off, Bethell drives this to cover for no run.
Full and on off, Jacob Bethell pushes this away for no run.
FOUR! Short and wide outside off, Jacob Bethell leans back and slashes hard at it. Beats the fielder at point and sees it race to the fence for four.
Good length on middle and off, Joe Root milks this through square leg for a single.
Quicker on the pads, Joe tucks this through square leg for one.
Tossed up on off, Jacob Bethell pushes this firmly towards the left of Shimron Hetmyer at short extra cover and takes one.
43rd ODI half-century for Root as he rolls this down to long on for one.
Fired in on middle and leg, Jacob Bethell backs away and cuts this to deep point for one.
Tossed up on the pads, Joe Root flicks this to long on for one.
Quicker and fuller on off, Jacob Bethell cuts this through point for one.
FOUR! Pitched up around off, Joe Root gets right on top of the bounce and drills this down the ground towards long on for four. Patience pays off for Root.
Back of a length on off, Joe Root solidly defends this out.
Good length on off, John Campbell defends this out.
Beaten again. Back of a length wide of off, Joe Root looks to poke at it but the ball moves away late and beats Root.
Length on off, Joe Root pushes this to point for no run.
That misbehaved a bit. Good length, wide of off, shoots up on the batter. Joe Root swings under it and gets beaten. Lucky for Root that he did not edge this.
Good length around off, Joe Root hops up on his toes and guides this through third man region for one. Root can play this stroke for an entire day and not get bored with it.
Full and on the pads, Jacob Bethell leans over and flicks this to long leg for one.
Bumper, around middle and leg, Jacob Bethell sways away.
On a length around middle and leg, Joe Root tucks this towards the on side for one.
Short and on off, Root pulls this towards mid-wicket for no run.
Back of a length on the pads, Joe Root goes for the flick but misses. Gets it clipped off his pads toward square leg for no run.
Good length on off, Joe Root guides this to third man region for one.
Good length around middle and off, Jacob Bethell cuts this to deep third for one.
Swing and a miss. On a length, wide outside off, Jacob Bethell swings and misses.
On a length around off, Jacob Bethell punches this to point for no run.
Length around off, Jacob Bethell goes for the drive but gets late it it. Hits this off the inside towards square leg for no run.
On a length around off, Jacob Bethell blocks this out.
Good length on middle and off, Joe Root drops this towards mid-wicket for no run.
On a length around middle and leg, Jacob Bethell goes for the flick but gets it edged toward the third man region for a single. 100 comes up for the home side.
Blocked off the front foot for no run.
Short-pitched, into the batter. Root mistimes the pull but beats square leg for a single.
Back of a length on off, Jacob Bethell dabs this to third man region for one.
On a length around the pads, Joe Root flicks this to fine leg for one.
Good length around off, Joe Root plays this late and guides this to third man region for one.
On a length around middle and leg, Joe Root tucks this off the inside of his bat towards mid-wicket for no run.
Pitched-up on off, Joe Root drives this to mid off for no run.
Back of a length on off, Joe Root pushes this to cover for no run.
Full and wide of off, Jacob Bethell drives this to sweeper cover for one.
On a length wide of off, Joe Root drives this to sweeper cover for one.
A spicy bumper, around middle and off. Jacob Bethell sways away from it.
On a length around off, Jacob Bethell drops this towards off.

OUT! CHOPPED ON! Alzarri Joseph is all over the English batting unit. Alzarri Joseph persists with the short-pitched ploy and gets rewarded for it again. Jos Buttler, looking to dab this towards third man region, gets beaten as this nipped back in and gets it deflected off the elbow back onto the stumps. Jos Buttler departs for a duck.
Jos Buttler (wk) b A Joseph 0 (8b 0x4 0x6)
Back of a length on off, Jos Buttler drops this towards cover for no run.
Short-pitched, around middle and off, Joe Root pulls this flat and towards deep square for one.
Good length on off, Joe Root defends this out on off.
Fuller one, jammed around silly point for no run.
On a length wide of off, shaping away from the batter. Jos Buttler swings and misses.
Touch fuller on middle and off, Jos Buttler flicks this to mid on for no run.
On a length around off, Jos Buttler steps a long way across and tucks this towards mid-wicket for no run.
Back of a length on middle and leg, Joe Root tucks this through mid-wicket for one.

FOUR! No slip in place and this has gone straight past the vacant first slip area for four. Full and wide outside off, Joe Root swings at it, gets an outside edge and the ball flies through first slip for four.
Bowl the heavy length again, into the batter. Jos Buttler gets rocked on the back foot as he looks to pull this one and barely misses the fielder at mid-wicket. A single taken.
Back of a length around off, Jos Buttler defends this one.

OUT! IN THE AIR AND GONE! Massive wicket for the visitors as they remove a set-looking Brook. Short-pitched, around middle and off, Harry Brook goes for the hook but gets undone by the pace. Brook gets it edged towards fine leg where Jayden Seales doesn't make any mistake and pouches this.
Harry Brook (c) c J Seales b A Joseph 47 (36b 7x4 1x6)
Short-pitched, on off, Harry Brook defends this one.

Cuts him in half. Back of a length around middle and off, Harry Brook looks to push at it. The ball nips back in sharply and beats the inside edge of Brook. Clips the thigh pad as Hope collects this behind the stumps.

On a length around the pads, Joe Root flicks this to the left of Brandon King at mid-wicket and sets off for a single. King dived full stretch to field this before aiming at the stumps at the non-striker's end. Root had given up on the single but King missed the stumps.
Short and wide outside off, Joe Root pushesh this through extra cover for one.
Short and wide of off, Harry Brook guides this to deep third for one.

FOUR! CRUNCHED! Touch fuller, wide of off, Harry Brook gets right on top of the delivery with a good stride out in front before he drives this past cover for a boundary. The fielder at sweeper cover could not do anything to protect this boundary.
Back of a length around middle and off, Root pulls this to deep square for one.
Back of a length on top of middle, Joe Root hops up on his toes and defends this out.
Good length around off, Harry Brook cuts this to sweeper cover for one.
A single to finish the Powerplay 1 as Harry Brook cuts this to the third man fielder.
FOUR LEG BYES! Joseph gets a touch too straight, Harry Brook gets inside the line of it and manages to clip this off his thigh pad, down to the fine leg fence for four.
Back of a length on off, Joe Root drops this towards the off side and takes one.
Fuller on the pads, Harry Brook flicks this through square leg for one.
Good length on the pads, Harry Brook tucks this towards short mid-wicket for no run.
FOUR! Easy picking for Brook. On a length down the leg, Harry Brook gets inside the line of it and flicks this through backward square leg region for a boundary.
Good length around off, Joe Root defends this one.

FOUR! What a shot! Back of a length around off, Root gets up on his toes, takes flight, and still manages to hit the ball cleanly with the middle of the bat. That's class! The crowd is absolutely loving it!
Good length on off, Joe Root jams this out towards cover.
Short-pitched, on off. Harry Brook cuts this towards deep third for a single.
Back of a length on off, Harry Brook defends this out.

FOUR! Boundaries galore in Cardiff. Good length wide of off, Harry Brook shimmies down the track and swings at it. Gets a top edge and the ball has sailed over first slip for a boundary. Earlier Root and now Brook have just escaped Justin Greaves at first slip.

FOUR! Fourth boundary of the over and Joe Root might have got Forde out of the attack with this onslaught. Good length on the pads, Joe Root leans over and flicks this through mid-wicket for four more.
FOUR! Now that's more like Root. Half-volley, around off. Joe Root strides in front, gets on top of it and drives this right out of the middle of his bat for four runs through cover.
FOUR! Edged and away for four. 50 up for the hosts. Short and wide outside off, Joe Root leans back and cuts at it. Gets it top edged over the tall figure of Justin Greaves at first slip for four.
Good length, on top of off again. Root blocks it out.

FOUR! Now that's what being patient in an ODI does for the batter. After back-to-back brilliant deliveries, Matthew Forde dishes one full and wide outside off, Joe Root gets on top of the bounce and drives this all along the carpet through cover for four.
Back of a length around middle and off, Joe Root solidly defends this out.
WIDE! On a length, drifting down the leg, Joe Root goes for the flick but misses. Wided.
Good length on middle and off, Harry Brook pushes this towards cover for no run.
Good length, keeping a tad low. Harry Brook does well to crouch low to block this out.

The ball is doing all the talking here. Inswinging delivery around the pads, Harry Brook goes for the nudge and gets beaten. Wears it on his front pad but the umpire turns down the LBW appeal as this looked to be going down the leg.
Back of a length around middle and off, Harry Brook blocks this out.
On a length around off, Harry Brook drives this to mid off for no run.

EDGED AND DROPPED! Harry Brook gets a lifeline as he is dropped by his counterpart on 30. Good length, around off, shaping just a hint away from the batter after pitching. Harry Brook gets lured into the drive but goes late to it. Gets an outside edge towards the right of Shai Hope behind the stumps. Hope dives to his right with one hand and does not pouch this.

This wasn't an appeal but a mini celebration as the Windies players thought they had got rid of Root but the umpire remained unmoved. Good length around middle and off, shaping back in sharply and beating Root on the inside. Matthew Forde was almost next to the keeper as he saw the umpire shake his head. Shai Hope sends this upstairs. The Ball Tracker confirms that it would have just clipped the stumps and the umpire's call of NOT OUT, saves the day for Joe Root.
Good length on off, Harry Brook cuts this towards deep third for one.

FOUR! That's how smart Harry Brook the batter is. Good length around off, Harry Brook plays this late and just does enough to beat the fielder at short third for four. The same fielder was stationed at the fence prior to this delivery and just as he was brought in, Brook exploited this area.
FOUR! WHACKED! Short and on off, Harry Brook spanks this fiercely down the ground to long off for four. Brook is slowly getting into his groove.

SIX! That's right out of the middle of Brook's bat. Short-pitched, on middle and off, Harry Brook stands upright and pulls this one. Gets it middled and the ball has sailed over the fence towards deep mid-wicket region for six.
Short and on off, Joe Root plays this late and gides this towards third man region for one.
Brook is living dangerously as he now mistimes the pull off the bottom of his bat but beyond the reach of Shimron Hetmyer at mid-wicket. Another couple added to the tally.
Brook gets lucky as he was beaten here by the inswinging delivery but managed to somehow get it flicked through square leg for two off the inside of his bat.
Back of a length wide of off, Joe Root steps down the track, opens the face of his bat and slices this past a diving Chase at point for one.
FOUR! Not the best of timings but in the gap for four. Short-pitched, around middle and off, Joe Root pulls this through mid-wicket and the ball has raced to the fence for four.
Length again around middle and off, Joe Root punches this back to the bowler.
Short and wide around off, Joe Root dabs this to second slip.
Root gets himself off the mark with this single towards mid on.
Good length on off, Joe Root pushes this to mid off for no run. Root is yet to get off the mark.
WIDE! Inswingin delivery but down the leg. Root misses the flick. Wided.
Short and wide outside off, Harry Brook cuts this towards deep third for one.
Back of a length on the pads, Harry Brook tucks this to short mid-wicket for no run.
FOUR! Finely tucked away for four. Good length on the pads. On a length spraying down the leg, Harry Brook leans over and tickles this fine to the fence towards fine leg for four.
Short-pitched, on the pads. Harry Brook nudges this towards square leg for no run.
Pitched-up on middle and off, Joe Root punches this firmly towards the left of Keacy Carty at mid on. Carty dives to his left and fields this keeping it down to a dot.
Good length on off, Joe Root defends this towards cover.
On a length around the pads, Root pushes this to mid on for no run.
WIDE! Good length drifting down the leg. Joe Root goes for the flick but misses. Wided.
Short and wide outside off, Harry Brook guides this past a diving Roston Chase at backward point for one.
Back of a length around off, Brook dabs this to backward point for no run.
Short-pitched, on off. Harry Brook jams this down.

Good length on off, Harry Brook dabs this straight to short third and takes a risky single. The fielder did aim at the stump towards the striker's end and had he hit the stumps, Root would have been dismissed too.
Good length on off, Harry Brook defends this off his front foot.
FOUR! Brook starts off with a boundary. Pitched-up around off, Harry Brook strides out in front and drives this through cover-point region for a boundary to get his innings going.

OUT! IN THE AIR AND GONE! Pitched-up, wide outside off, taking it further away from the batter. Ben Duckett stands and throws his bat at it. Gets a leading edge straight to Jayden Seales at deep third. England find themselves in trouble after losing 2 for 2. Both the openers are back in the hut and both had added nothing to the total.
Ben Duckett c J Seales b M Forde 0 (3b 0x4 0x6)
WIDE! Another extra as Forde darts this way too wide outside off. Wided.
Slightly fuller around off, Ben Duckett pushes this firmly to mid off for no run.
Hits the hard length, taking it away from the left-hander. Ben Duckett blocks this out.
Back of a length around middle and off, Joe Root blocks this out.
On a length around off, Joe Root pushes this to mid off for no run.

OUT! EDGED AND GONE! Caught behind. Good length, around middle and off, shaping just a fraction away from the batter after pitching. Jamie Smith goes for the drive off the front foot. The ball does enough to catch the outside edge of Smith's bat and Shai Hope behind the stumps makes no mistake. Jamie Smith departs for a duck.
Jamie Smith c S Hope b J Seales 0 (4b 0x4 0x6)
WIDE! On a length wide down the leg, Jamie Smith goes for the flick but misses out. Wided.
Another dot as Smith has punches this to mid off.
Short and wide outside off, Jamie Smith pushes this towards point for no run.
Starts by attacking the stumps with a length delivery around off. Jamie Smith gets right behind the line of it and blocks this out.

OUT! IN THE AIR AND GONE! Slower one, wide of off. Shai Hope swings early and only manages to get it away off the toe end of his bat. The ball spooned over mid off and Harry Brook made no mistake and pouched this. West Indies, batting first, have posted 308.
Shai Hope (c) c H Brook b S Mahmood 78 (66b 4x4 4x6)
FOUR! Shai Hope finds the fence and that's why he turned down the single on the previous delivery.
Short and wide outside off, Shai Hope punches this to deep point but denies the single on offer. Strange from Hope as Jayden Seales surely can bat and bat well as he showed in the previous game.
Short and wide outside off, Shai Hope attempts the reverse ramp but misses.

OUT! TIMBER! Adil Rashid ends his spell with another wicket. Quicker and flatter into the stumps, Alzarri Joseph goes with the ritual of swinging at everything. Misses it completely and the ball sneaks past his bat and rattles the timber.
Alzarri Joseph b A Rashid 10 (3b 1x4 1x6)
FOUR! Streaky but WI wouldn't mind one bit. Fuller on middle and off, Alzarri Joseph goes for the slog sweep but gets an outside edge and it has gone past the left of short third for a boundary.
SIX! 300 up for Windies. Tossed up, in the hitting zone for Alzarri Joseph and he does not disappoint. Alzarri Joseph swings and deposits this over Joe Root at long on.

OUT! SAFELY POUCHED THIS TIME! Wrong'un around off, Gudakesh Motie was aiming for the slog sweep. The ball gets miscued off the cue end and has lobbed over Joe Root at long off. Joe Root runs in from the fence, settles underneath and makes no mistake this time.
Gudakesh Motie c J Root b A Rashid 18 (9b 4x4 0x6)

DROPPED! Fourth drop of the game and we still have a little over 3 overs to go. Out of all, it was Root who dropped this. Tossed up on the pads. Shai Hope clears his front foot and slogs this. Doesn't get it away from the middle of his bat and it has travelled straight to Joe Root at long on. Root goes with hard hands at it and ends up dropping Hope.

SIX! SMASHEDDDD! Short of a length around middle and leg, Shai Hope picks up the length early and rocks back and away from the stumps. Swings and connects well. The ball has sailed over the fence and into the stands for a huge six.

FOUR! Fourth boundary off the over and Gudakesh Motie has ensured that the gamble to bowl Will Jacks doesn't work for Harry Brook. Short and on off, Gudakesh Motie rocks back and cuts this fine to the right of short third for four.
FOUR! WOAH! Motie surely can handle the willow well. Full and on middle and off, Gudakesh Motie gets down on a knee and nails the scoop over the keeper for a boundary behind the stumps.

Fired into the batter, around his pads. Gudakesh Motie looks to cut this off his back foot but is cramped for room. The ball hits him on his pads and Will Jacks appeals for LBW. The umpire is unmoved but Harry Brook sends this upstairs. The Ball Tracker suggests that this would have gone on and missed the stumps.
FOUR! Another boundary but this time a bit more conventional paddle. Tossed up on the pads, Gudakesh Motie paddles this fine and wide to the left of short fine for four more.

FOUR! That's sensational from Motie as he has played the field. Slightly short of a length on the pads, Gudakesh Motie gets down on a knee and plays this late. Paddles this perfectly beyond backward square leg for four. Saqib Mahmood was after it but he fails to keep it inside the playing area.
Floated on the pads, Gudakesh Motie tucks this to short mid-wicket for no run.
A single to end the over as Gudakesh Motie dabs it to point.
Short of a length and on middle, Hope gets his eyes off and pulls it to square leg for one.
JUST ONE! Bowls it on the pads. Gudakesh Motie tucks it to square leg for a single.

OUT! GONE! Pretty easy for Mahmood! Good length and outside off.Chase has a poke at it but toe ends his shot and the keeper does the rest. Tame attempt from Roston Chase and he has to go. Saqib Mahmood is on a hat trick...
Roston Chase c J Buttler b S Mahmood 0 (1b 0x4 0x6)

OUT! GONE! Saqib Mahmood deserves a wicket. He has bowled well! West Indies losing wickets at the wrong time. Bowls it into the surface, short and outside off. Matthew Forde shuffles across and gets in a tangle but still swings his blade, slices it up and over mid off where Harry Brook tracks back under the sun with no glares but keeps his eyes on the ball right till the end to take it. Brilliant catch.
Matthew Forde c H Brook b S Mahmood 1 (4b 0x4 0x6)
Starts with a bumper on middle, Matthew Forde ducks under it.
SIX! One handed shot! Tosses it full and on middle, Hope gets on one knee and slogs it high down the ground for a biggie. Sheer power behind it.
Fuller and on middle, Matthew Forde sweeps it to deep square leg for a single.

Tossed up full and around off. Matthew Forde steps across to sweep but misses and gets hit on the pads. Impact looks outside the line. Harry Brook still takes it upstairs and the replay does show the impact is the umpire's call.
THREE WIDES! Bowls it full and down the leg side. Matthew Forde looks to sweep but misses and it rolls to fine leg for a couple.

OUT! GONE! Jacob Bethell gets his first wicket! Floated very full and on middle, Greaves swings his blade hard but gets more height than distance. Ben Duckett at long off takes a relatively simple catch there.
Justin Greaves c B Duckett b J Bethell 22 (22b 2x4 0x6)
Flat and outside off, Hope slaps it to deep cover for a single.
A couple to start the over! Drops it slightly short and on middle, Hope pulls it to long on where Will Jacks runs to his right and flicks it back inside the ground for a couple. Good stop.
Potts dishes out the yorker on middle, Greaves digs it out to the bowler.
Bangs it short and around off, Hope pulls but gets a top edge to mid off where it lands safely. One.
FOUR! No one is stopping that! A yorker perfectly placed on middle, Hope makes room, jams it out with an angled bat and it flies to square leg for a four.
Very full and around off. Hope smashes it down the ground. Innovative from Harry Brook as he places him fine at mid on just before the ball. No run.

SIX! The skipper ignites his engine. Fifty for Shai Hope! 250 up for West Indies! Bowls it on a length and angling on middle, anticipated as that's what Matthew Potts has bowled throughout the day. Hope opens up his body and thumps it to long on for a six.
Too full and on middle, Greaves drills it to long on for a single.
Flighted outside off, this is pushed to long off for a single. 11 runs off the over.
FOUR! Solid from Greaves! He has changed gears! Flat and on middle, Greaves heaves it over mid-wicket, a couple of bounces and into the fence.
TWO RUNS! Quicker on middle. Greaves reverse sweeps it to short third. The fielder dives to his left and parries it away resulting in two runs.
FOUR! Welcome boundary! Much needed for West Indies who slowed up a touch in last 10 overs. Tossed up on middle, it is swept through mid-wicket for a boundary.
Tossed up on middle and was the googly. Greaves nudges it to mid-wicket.
On the pads. Hope flicks it to deep mid-wicket for a single.
Too full and on middle and leg. Greaves turns it to mid-wicket.
Slower in the air full and on middle, Greaves chips it back to Jacob Bethell who dives but once again it falls short of the fielder.
On middle, Hope punches it to cover for a single.
Tossed up on middle, Greaves slog-sweeps it to deep mid-wicket. Matthew Potts runs to his right and picks up on a bounce. Almost overran as well but does well to stop.
Boundaries have dried up! Fuller and on middle, Hope pushes it to long off for a single.
Full and on middle, drilled to long on for a single.
Fuller ball on middle, Greaves flicks it to deep square leg for a single.
Full and on middle, nudged straight to square leg.
Wide! Shorter and down the leg side. Greaves looks to heave but misses.
Tossed up on leg. Greaves looks to reverse sweep but bottom edges it on the deck.
Couple more! Tossed up on middle, Greaves makes room and splices his drive to point for a brace.
Will Jacks bowls into the surface and around off. Greaves pulls it past square leg for a couple of runs.
Quicker, shorter and on middle, Hope pulls it to mid-wicket for one.
Tossed up, outside off. Hope knocks it to point for a single.
Too full and angling on the pads. Hope flicks it to mid-wicket.
Tossed up on middle, Greaves tucks it to long on for a single.
Flights it very full and on off, Hope comes down the track and hits it to long on for one.
Too full and on middle, Greaves turns it to mid-wicket.
Flighted full on leg, it turns in and bounces unexpectedly. Greaves fails to sweep and gets hit high on the pads. An appeal follows but that was too high.
Carse bowls the hard length delivery, outside off. Hope swings his blade hard but misses.
Bowls it short and into the surface on middle. Hope pulls it past mid-wicket for a couple of runs.
Greaves is off the mark as he works this behind square leg for a single.
Serves it short and on middle, Greaves nudges it to mid-wicket.
A length ball on off, Hope punches it to cover for a single.
Short of a length and around off, extra bounce. Hope takes his eyes off as he defends off the gloves.

OUT! LBW! That is plumb as you like! Adil Rashid nicely flights it full and on middle, Hetmyer puts his front foot across to defend but misses it as it turns a bit. A huge appeal for LBW and up goes the finger. Hetmyer reviews. UltraEdge shows no bat. Ball Tracking shows THREE REDS. Adil Rashid strikes again. Two wickets in two overs for England.
Shimron Hetmyer lbw A Rashid 4 (4b 0x4 0x6)
Drops it slightly short and on middle, Hope pulls it to square leg for one.
The googly to the left-hander, outside off. Hetmyer punches it to long off for one.
Fighted full and outside off, Hope knocks it past cover for one more.
Tossed up, outside off, Hope drives it through covers for no run.
Flighted full on middle, Hope keeps it out on the leg side.
Too full and wide of off. Hetmyer hits it through covers for a couple of runs.
One more run as Hope plays it through covers.
Fuller ball on middle, Hetmyer flicks it to mid-wicket for a single.

OUT! STUMPED! Hundred and out for Keacy Carty! Pre-meditative charge from Keacy Carty and Will Jacks gives it some flight and bowls it through air on off. Keacy Carty looks to flick but misses and the keeper, Jos Buttler does the rest. Keacy Carty continues to shine on the big stage.
Keacy Carty st J Buttler b W Jacks 103 (105b 13x4 0x6)
Flat and around off. Hope punches it to cover for a single.
SIX! 200 up in style for the visitors. Bowls it very full and outside off. Hope swings his blade across on one knee and deposits it over long on for a six.
Shapes in a full ball on middle, Hope works it to long on for one.
Too full and outside off, Keacy Carty drives it through covers for a single.
Shorter and outside off, this is cut to point for a single.
Tossed up on middle, Keacy Carty plays it to long on for one.

FOUR! CENTURY for Keacy Carty! Third century in his last four innings in ODI cricket! Short and slow outside off. Keacy Carty opens the face of the bat and dabs it past short third for a boundary. His 2nd vs England! Man in form!
Wide! Slides it down the leg side. Keacy Carty fails to flick.
Angles it full and on leg, Hope tucks it to deep mid-wicket for one.
Bowls full again and on middle, drilled to long on for a single.
Too full and on middle. Hope chips it down to the left of mid-wicket. Could have easily gone into the fielder's hand there.
Short in length and around off, Hope pulls it to mid-wicket.
Bowls the slower one, full and outside off. Hope looks to drive but misses. Good change up from Potts.
A good length ball on off. Hope punches it straight to mid off. Matthew Potts falls on his follow through but gets up quickly.
Shorter and outside off. Hope cuts it to the right of third man for a couple of runs.
BEATEN! Better from Bethell! Quicker, fuller and around off, it spins away. Keacy Carty looks to drive but misses.
Fuller and around off. Hope plays it to covers for one more.
Tossed up, outside off, Keacy Carty drives it to deep point for a single.
Flat and outside off. Hope works it to cover for a single.
Bowls the quicker one, outside off. Hope reaches for it and tries to slap but finds point.
Tossed up full and on middle, Hope defends it on the deck.
Good tempting over from Potts! Building a bit of pressure. Short in length and over the off pole. Keacy Carty uses his feet to push but misses.
On a length and around off, Keacy Carty is late as he tries to punch this away.
An in-angler, length and on middle, Hope hangs back and blocks it out.
Too full and comes with an inward shape on middle, Keacy Carty tickles it to fine leg for a single.
Good length ball, outside off. Hope strokes it to deep cover for one.
This is full and outside off. Hope drives it to point where the fielder dives to his left and saves crucial runs.
The in-nipper, length and on middle, Keacy Carty turns it to mid-wicket.
Good length ball on middle, Keacy Carty blocks.

FOUR! Keacy Carty moves to 95! There is no weakness around him right now! Short of a length and around off. Keacy Carty pulls it hard and to the left of mid-wicket who stretches himself but the ball whizzes past him for four.
Bowls it into the surface and around off. Hope plays it to point for a single.
Outside off, Keacy Carty guides it to third man for a single.
On a length and around off. Hope taps it in front of cover for a quick single.
A single to end the over as Hope drives it through covers.
Floated full on middle, Hope defends on the front foot.
Too full and outside off, this is driven past cover for a single.
Flighted around off, fuller and Keacy Carty pushes it to cover.
Bowls it on leg and makes it to spin back in. Hope turns it to mid-wicket for one.
Flighted full on middle, Keacy Carty drills it to long on for a single.
This is tight onto the stumps. Hope hops and nudges it to square leg.
This is full and outside off. Keacy Carty drives it square past point for a single.
Serves it short and outside off, Keacy Carty leaves it alone.
Three dots then! Into the surface, this is close to the off pole. Keacy Carty solidly blocks.
A length ball on top of off. Keacy Carty knocks it to cover.
A length ball on off, nips in. Keacy Carty tucks it to mid-wicket.
FOUR! It is looking too easy for West Indies at the moment! Flighted outside off. Hope leans and creams it through covers, threads past the fielder for a boundary.
Tossed up on middle, Keacy Carty punches it to long on for a single.
Flatter trajectory and on off, Hope drills it to long off for a single.
The slider, this is full and outside off. Hope pushes it square on the off side.
On middle, fuller and Hope leans and defends it out.
Tossed up on off, spins in. Hope tucks it to mid-wicket.
FOUR! Even short ball stuff is not working for England. Shorter and on leg, Keacy Carty pulls it with confident and to fine leg for a boundary.
Bangs it short and close to the head around leg. Keacy Carty sways away from the line of it.
Short in length and around off. Hope plays it to cover for a single.
Hard length delivery, outside off. Hope taps it to cover.
FOUR! Not off the middle but Hope won't mind! Keeps it short and bowls around off. Hope gets tall and jabs it past mid-wicket and it rolls into the fence.
Short in length and on off, Hope pulls it to deep square leg for a couple of runs. He's a confident player of the short balls.
Floated full and outside off, Keacy Carty drives it to deep cover for a couple of runs.
Shai Hope is off the mark as he nudges this to long on for a run.
Slows in the air, full and on middle, Hope defends off the inner half on the on side.
Tossed up on off. Hope steps across and pushes it to point.

OUT! GONE! England finally tasted success! Adil Rashid flights it full and outside off. King charges down the track and tries to go downtown but mistimes and Brydon Carse at long off runs to his right and holds onto it. Can England build on it?
Brandon King c B Carse b A Rashid 59 (67b 10x4 0x6)
Tossed up on off, Keacy Carty sweeps it to square leg for a single.
Keacy Carty is living dangerously. Short again from Carse, this is on middle, Keacy Carty pulls it and gets a top edge to mid-wicket. The fielder runs back but it falls well over him.
Brydon Carse sticks to the short ball, around off. Keacy Carty pulls off the cue end and well over mid off for a couple.
FOUR! Good shot! Short of a length and on middle and leg. Keacy Carty pulls it hard and through mid-wicket for a boundary.
Goes too short this time. Keacy Carty sits under it.
FOUR! Rides the bounce! Tries the bumper on middle, Keacy Carty gets tall and pulls it over mid-wicket for an easy boundary. England need some plans with the ball.
Brydon Carse steams in and lands it on a length outside off. Keacy Carty makes room and slashes his blade but misses.
Aerial but safe! Floated around off. Keacy Carty punches on the up and past cover for one.
Tossed up on off, spins back in. Keacy Carty watchfully blocks.
Wide! Tries the googly but bowls it down the leg side, it is left alone.
A single as Brandon King works it down to long on.
Very full and on middle, King goes for the reverse sweep and hits it well but to point.
Too full and outside off, Keacy Carty drives it to long on for a single.
Flights it full and outside off. King reverse sweeps it through point for a single.
FOUR! Punished! Bowls it short and outside off. Keacy Carty goes back inside his crease and slaps it past point for a boundary.
Easy singles at the moment! Flat and outside off, King punches it to long off for a single.
Another single as Keacy Carty plays it down to long on.
Tossed up on off, King drives it to long off for a single.
On the pads. Keacy Carty works it to deep square leg for a single.
Full and outside off, Keacy Carty pushes it to cover.

CHANCE! England need to up their game on the field! On middle, Keacy Carty plays it back to Carse who gets a hand and deflects it to mid on. The batters are in a mix up for a single and the fielder throws at the batter's end. King runs across, dives and makes his end.
Length ball on off, Keacy Carty punches it to cover.
Outside off. King works it to short third man for a single.
FOUR! Runs coming regularly at a firm pace! In the slot, full and around off, King heaves it over mid-wicket for a boundary.
Dishes out a fuller delivery on middle, King makes room and plays it to mid on.
Starts with a bumper on middle, King ducks under it.
Slows it up nd bowls it flat and outside off. Keacy Carty looks to push it away but misses.
That's fifty for Brandon King! Fine knock so far from the opener and needs to double up now. Full and outside off, King drives it through covers for a single.
Tossed up on off, King drops it to point. He wants a single this time but is sent back.
Flighted full and outside off. King drives it straight to short cover.
Very full and around off. King prods and blocks it out.

A googly on the fuller side on middle, King turns it to square leg. Keacy Carty wanted a quick single but was sent back by King. The fielder picks up and throws but misses by a long mile. Keacy Carty would have been a goner there.
FOUR! Boundary ruins the over! 9 runs off the over! Pitched up on off. Keacy Carty nicely drives it through covers and it races to the fence.
Goes full and on off, King drives it to the left of mid off for one.
Potts keeps it short and slants it on leg. King sits under it.
Angles in a length and on middle, tucked to mid-wicket.
MUCH BETTER FROM Potts! Bangs it short and around off, King looks to pull but misses.
FOUR! King racing to his fifty now! Too full and outside off, King smashes it down the ground. Ben Duckett runs to his left from long on, dives but fails to stop with his hands.
Slower one on the pads. Keacy Carty waits and flicks it fine to fine leg for a couple of runs.
Tossed up on off, Keacy Carty pushes it to cover.
Too full and on middle, Keacy Carty hangs back and defends.
FOUR! Fifty for Keacy Carty! He is back with runs! A big boost for West Indies! Shorter and on middle, Keacy Carty pulls it through square leg for four.
Wide! 100 up for Windies! Slides it down the leg side. Keacy Carty fails to clip it away.
The googly, flat and on leg. Keacy Carty opens up his body to flick but misses and gets hit on the pads.
Adil Rashid starts with a full ball on middle, Keacy Carty leans and blocks.
Length ball, around off. King solidly defends it on the off side.
Outside off, Keacy Carty cuts it through point for a single.
Streaky runs! Skiddy length delivery on off, Keacy Carty looks to drive but inside edges it past the stumps and to fine leg for two.
Brandon King enjoys the width again as he hits it past cover for a single.
On a length and outside off. Keacy Carty slams it through covers for a single.
Serves it full and on middle and off. Keacy Carty pushes it down to mid on.
Tossed up on middle, Brandon King blocks it out.
Flatter and outside off, Keacy Carty plays it to deep point for a single.
Bowls it quicker and on middle, Keacy Carty nudges it through mid-wicket for a couple of runs.
Full and on off, King drives it to cover for a single.
DROPPED! England have been poor on the field! Flat and quick on the pads. Keacy Carty whips it to square leg where Saqib Mahmood tries to reverse cup near his face but spoons it out.
Tossed up, outside off, Keacy Carty knocks it past point for easy couple of runs.
Length and on off, Keacy Carty plays it to cover for a single.
Saqib Mahmood goes back to the good length channel, outside off. Keacy Carty has a poke at it but misses.
A nice bumper, outside off. King pulls it delicately to mid-wicket for a single.
Outside off, Keacy Carty drops it to third man for a single.
JUST SHORT! Digs it short and bowls it on middle, Keacy Carty pulls it flat and to short mid-wicket who picks up on a bounce.
Short of a length and around off, Keacy Carty plays it back to the bowler.
Brandon King attempts the sweep again and hits well but finds the man at short fine leg.
FOUR! AND AGAIN! Serves it full and onto the pads. King sweeps it hard and through square leg for a boundary.
FOUR! Poor line from Jacob Bethell! Again down the leg side. King sweeps it past leg slip and to the fine leg fence.
Wide! Too full and angling down leg. King looks to sweep but misses.
Too full and on middle, Keacy Carty works it to long on for a single.
Slides it way across the line, down leg and Keacy Carty slog-sweeps but mistimes and hits it behind square leg for just two.
Tosses it up on middle, Keacy Carty bunts it on the leg side.
Touch fuller and on middle, King softly nudges it to short mid-wicket.
Top nut! Saqib Mahmood generates the extra bounce as he bowls into the surface, this is on middle. King looks to jab it out but gets hit near his biceps.
Swing and a miss! King charges down and Saqib Mahmood drops his length back on middle. King works across the line but misses.
Good length delivery on off, King hops and drops it on the off side.
On the pads, Keacy Carty helps it to fine leg for a single.
Saqib Mahmood bowls the in-nipper, length and on off. Keacy Carty is through his shot but edges it onto the pads.
Tad short and on middle, Keacy Carty pulls it through square leg for a single.
One more run as King plays with soft hands to point.
DROP AND RUN! Shapes in a length ball on off, Keacy Carty taps it to cover for a quick single.
Pushes it full and on middle, Keacy Carty eases it to mid on.
FOUR! Keacy Carty moves into the 30s with a streaky shot! A skiddy length outside off. Keacy Carty looks to push but inside edges it past leg pole and to fine leg for four.
Short in length and on off, Keacy Carty pulls it past mid-wicket. The man from deep square leg runs across and slides to save two.
Fuller ball, outside off, Keacy Carty punches it to cover for a single.
BEATEN! Saqib Mahmood serves in the channel, around off, fuller length. Keacy Carty looks to defend but extra bounce carries it past his edge and shaves past the pole.
Saqib Mahmood bowls the hard length on middle, Keacy Carty looks to defend but gets misses and gets hit on the box.
Too full and on middle, King eases it to mid on for a quick single.
Outside off, Keacy Carty guides it to third man for a single.
Saqib Mahmood comes back for a quick spell! Bowls it full and around off, Keacy Carty looks to defend but gets a soft leading edge to second slip who picks up on a bounce.
Keeps it full and on off at 133 clicks. Keacy Carty strokes it through covers for a single.
Angles it on the pads. King bunts it to deep square leg for a single.
This is full and on middle, King plays it back to the bowler.
Potts goes full and onto the pads but bowls with an angle. King fails to clip and gets hit on the pads. A stifled appeal but that was going down.
Matthew Potts serves it full and on middle, King nudges it to mid-wicket.
POWERPLAY 2 time! A length ball, outside off, Keacy Carty knocks it to covers for a run.
LEG BYE! Shorter and angling on the pads. Keacy Carty misses his flick and it rolls to short fine leg for a leg bye.
Four dots in a row! Creates the angle again but goes full this time, on off. Keacy Carty looks to push but inside edges it onto the pads.
Another dot! Brydon Carse bowls from wide of the crease on middle. Keacy Carty defends with a straight bat.
Touch fuller and around off. Keacy Carty knocks it straight to point.
Shorter and outside off, Keacy Carty shoulders arms to it.
Length ball, outside off. King slaps it to deep cover for a single.
Tidy from Potts! Good length delivery, outside off. Keacy Carty throws his bat at it in an attempt to block but misses.
Outside off on a length. Keacy Carty punches it to cover.
Shapes in a full ball on middle, King drills it to mid on for a single.
On a nagging length, outside off. King dabs it straight to backward point.
Too full and on middle, this is eased to mid on.
Matthew Potts gives room and bowls it outside off. King looks to cut it away but misses.
FOUR! Even better! Best of the lot! 50 up for the Windies! Goes very full and on middle, Keacy Carty checks drives it down the ground and it races to the fence.

FOUR! Lovely shot! West Indies much more confident with the bat! In the slot, full and on off, Keacy Carty drives it to the right of mid off where the fielder dives above it and lets it roll for four.
Wide! Goes a bit short and angles it on leg, Keacy Carty looks to pull but misses.
Brydon Carse keeps the same length and bowls it on middle, nips in. Keacy Carty inside edges his block onto the pads.
Bowls it full and on middle, Keacy Carty solidly blocks it.
FOUR! Another one to the list! Good length delivery, outside off. Keacy Carty punches it through covers, in the gap for a boundary.
FOUR! Boundaries flowing suddenly! Shapes this one on the pads. Keacy Carty easily helps it down to fine leg for a boundary.
Keacy Carty keeps the strike as he pushes it to extra cover.
Too full and around off, King taps it to cover for a run.
FOUR! Two in a row! Excellent stuff from King! Bowls it full and in the hitting arc, around off. King smashes it over mid off for a bounndary.
FOUR! King has started his innings well! Short of a length and on middle, King gets low inside his crease and pulls it behind square leg for a boundary.
Potts angles in a full ball on middle, very tight and King equally blocks it solidly.
Touch fuller and around off. Keacy Carty drives it to extra cover for a single.
Slides it very full and angling on leg, King steps across to flick but misses it.
FOUR! Good shot! Short of a good length and on middle, King whacks it through mid-wicket for a boundary.
A length ball, outside off, shaping away. King leaves it alone.
Brydon Carse goes very full and around off. King digs it out to point.
A good length ball angling on the pads. King fails to flick and gets hit high on the pads.

FOUR! CHANCE! Ben Duckett again in the thick of action! Full and wide of off. King drives but gets a thick outside edge to second slip. Ben Duckett this time goes with both hands above his head but palms it over to third man.
Full on off, Carty drives this to cover for no run.
Back of a length, around middle and off, Keacy Carty gets beaten on the inside and wears it on his back pad. This would have missed the stumps on height.
Length on off, Keacy Carty pushes this towards extra cover for no run.
LEG BYE! Back of a length on the pads, King goes for the nudge towards square leg but misses and ends up deflecting this off his thigh pad towards square leg for one.
Back of a length around middle and leg, Keacy Carty tucks this towards leg for a single.
Good length on off, Keacy Carty cuts this on the bounce to point.
PEACH! Awayswinging yorker just outside off. Brandon King falls over as he looks to punch this down the ground and the ball misses the off-pole just by an inch.
Good length outside off, left alone.
Good length wide of off, Keacy Carty cuts this to deep third for one.
Short and wide outside off, Keacy Carty leaves it.

Edged and dropped. Keacy Carty gets a lifeline as he is dropped by Ben Duckett on 1. Full and wide outside off, shaping away from the batter. Keacy Carty goes for the drive and gets an outside edge towards the right of Ben Duckett at first slip. Ben gets one hand behind the ball but it goes in an dpops out in the blink of an eye.
Around off, Carty blocks this out.
Short-pitched, around off. Brandon King shimmies down the ground and looks to punch at it but gets beaten.
FOUR! Slightly overpitched, outside off. Brandon King strides on top of the bounce and drives this all along the carpet throgu extra cover for four runs.
Back of a length on the pads. Brandon King misses out on the flick as he deflects this off his thigh pad towards square leg.
Good length on off, King defends this one.
On a length wide of off, Keacy Carty cuts this to deep third for one.

Excellent bit of work in the field by Will Jacks as he saves a run for his side. Short-pitched, wide of off. Brandon King lofts this over cover and runs three. The ball was destined to the fence but Jacks ran to his right from sweeper cover, put in a dive and saved this from crashing into the fence.
Good length on off, Keacy Carty gets right behind it and blocks this one. A wicket maiden for Carse.

OUT! IN THE AIR AND GONE! A duck for Jewel Andrew as his poor run continues. Carse peppers that nagging length outside off, with the ball not moving away but going straight this time. Jewel Andrew goes for the expansive drive but hits this high off his bat and straight to Will Jacks at point.
Jewel Andrew c W Jacks b B Carse 0 (5b 0x4 0x6)
Length again, wide of off again. Jewel Andrew has no interest in poking at it.
Back of a length around off, Jewel Andrew blocks this out.
Good length, wide of off, away swinger. Jewel Andrew leaves it.
Full and wide outside off, moving further away after pitching. Jewel Andrew throws his bat at it and gets beaten the to swing.
Good length, going straight past the batter as he looks to defend this one. King gets lucky that it didn't catch an outside edge.

Much better from the bowler this time. A bit closer to the off-stumps, on a good length and seaming away as well. Brandon King looks to block this on his front foot but gets beaten on the outside edge.
Short-pitched, on off. Brandon King dabs this towards point for no run.
WIDE! Good length, wide outside off. Swinging away from the batter. Brandon King leaves it. The ball is called a wide again. Second extra of the over.

FOUR! First runs off the bat and it comes in the form of a boundary. Back of a length around off, Brandon King hops up on his toes and punches this crisply through cover for four runs to get his innings underway.
Back of a length wide of off, Brandon King goes for the punch off the back foot but gets it chopped off the inside back to the bowler.
On a length wide of off, Brandon King shoulders arms it.
WIDE! An extra to get us underway in Cardiff. Good length wide outside off, Brandon King leaves it. The ball bounces in front of Jamie Smith behind the stumps as he collects it. Wided.
